episode.title: 田中くんのしあわせ
Tanaka-kun`s Happiness
Tanaka-kun no Shiawase
episode.summary: To Tanaka, nothing is more important than having a peaceful life. He`ll spare no effort to be lazy and will try everything he can to secure the optimum location during the seating change. Attracted to Tanaka, Shiraishi hopes to be closer to him since she got to seat right next to him. Source: crunchyroll
